name: Project Occupant
description:
The year 2082. The USA has been occupied by Chinese forces for 2 years. About a year ago, Europe was able to deflect the first wave of attacks in The Battle of Moscow. Four months ago British spies have discovered documents about a project codenamed Occupant. The specifics of the project are still unknown, but even with limited information, it is clear, that within a year Europe will get occupied. But there is still hope. The largest Chinese aircraft carrier has docked in New York. After decoding radio signals it became clear that is it there because of Project Occupant. You are part of an elite military unit sent to New York to destroy the project.

Project Occupant is a top-down shooter with multiple abilities. At your disposal are several gadgets, like different grenades, traps and a special military suit. The suit allows you to change appearance, go through walls and even gives you the power of telekinesis.
 The game will be divided into 5 level themes, for example, suburbs, Midtown Manhattan skyscrapers and aircraft carrier. Each theme will have 5 - 7 levels.
